Example_18.review: Awful everything. From the bad service, to the diluted soup, to the lame-no chicken on the chicken salad, to the PRE-fabricated pizza. AVOID THIS PLACE!

{
  "Most important phrase": "Awful everything",
  "Second most important phrase": "bad service",

  "Any other important phrases": "lame-no chicken on the chicken salad", "PRE-fabricated pizza, AVOID THIS PLACE!" 
  	:
  "Explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language throughout the review, indicating a very poor experience with multiple aspects of the restaurant, including the service and several menu items. The use of capital letters in 'AVOID THIS PLACE!' emphasizes their negative sentiment.",
  "Final Sentiment Classification": 1
}

Example_59.review: Love it here. The food was great and had anazing service. Will be back again! Everyone was so poliet and greeted us with a smile.

  "Any other important phrases": "Will be back again", "Everyone was so polite and greeted us with a smile" 
  	: "The review is overwhelmingly positive, with high praise for the food, service, and overall experience.",
  "Final Sentiment Classification": 5
}
